roleset.name: to restore

example.name: rehabilitate-v: passive
example.text: Enthusiasts assume that national service would get important work done cheaply : forest fires fought , housing rehabilitated , students tutored , day - care centers staffed .

example.name: rehabilitate-v: args 0 and 1
example.text: They rehabilitated his reputation as a philosopher .

example.name: rehabilitate-v: Args 0 and 2
example.text: was granted membership after they rehabilitated his alcoholism .

example.name: rehabilitate-v: all args
example.text: His wife , Amy , rehabilitated him from a midcareer free fall .

example.name: rehabilitation-n: Arg1, 2
example.text: She designs Pilates programs for clients that have been released from medical care and physical therapy to help continue their rehabiliation of muscoloskeletal injuries .

example.name: rehabilitation-n: Just arg2
example.text: Termite rehabilitation is not a job for you - the homeowner .

example.name: rehabilitation-n: Arg0 and 1
example.text: A big congratulations to Spanish architecture firm , Martin Le Jarraga , who recently won a first prize Architecture & Interior Design Award for their rehabilitation of an old fencing room in Arsenal on Cartagena .

propbank.arg: of an old fencing room in Arsenal on Cartagena

example.name: rehabilitation-n: args 0 and 2
example.text: Investigation is needed to identify useful predictors of compliance , ultimately aiding sports medicine professionals in their rehabilitation of injury .

example.name: rehabilitation-n
example.text: the next stages of the Sahelian recovery and rehabilitation from drought

roleset.note: REHABILITATE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. No VNcls. (from rehabilitate.01-v)
REHABILITATION-N NOTES: Reframed by Julia 7/2012. No VNcls. (from rehabilitation.01-n)
